title: Mommy, I don't feel good
story: Mommy. I don't feel good. What's wrong, Joseph? My stomach hurts. Oh no. Let me get some medicine. Okay, mommy. Here, Joseph. Drink this. Thank you, mom. I'll call the school. Try to rest, dear.
summary: A young boy tells his mom that he doesn't feel well, and she takes care of him.
image: An illustration of a young boy sitting in bed while his mom gives him medicine.
